name: In re the Nomination Papers of Jennifer L. MANN as Candidate for State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. Appeal of Jennifer L. Mann
name_abbreviation: In re the Nomination Papers of Mann

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD and McCAFFERY, JJ.
parties: In re the Nomination Papers of Jennifer L. MANN as Candidate for State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. Appeal of Jennifer L. Mann.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of April, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Matthew Todd Croslis, Croslis Law Offices, L.L.C., Karen M. Balaban, for Jennifer L. Mann, appellant.
Lawrence M. Otter, Harrisburg, for Helene Ratner and John Mundie, appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
944 A.2d 77
In re the Nomination Papers of Jennifer L. MANN as Candidate for State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. Appeal of Jennifer L. Mann.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted on Briefs March 27, 2008.
Decided April 7, 2008.
Matthew Todd Croslis, Croslis Law Offices, L.L.C., Karen M. Balaban, for Jennifer L. Mann, appellant.
Lawrence M. Otter, Harrisburg, for Helene Ratner and John Mundie, appellees.
BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD and McCAFFERY, JJ.
